edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.tasks.data
Class CollectionBatchOptions

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.tasks.data.CollectionBatchOptions

public class CollectionBatchOptions
extends java.lang.Object

During a remote ingest, as opposed to a local ADR ingest, This class is used to set the batch options based on the collection.

Method Summary
static BatchIngestOptions getEctdOptions()
          Deprecated.  
static BatchIngestOptions getGenericBatchOptions()
          Sets the following batchOptions...

batchOptions.setBatchDescription( "generic ingest" ); // set from batch file?
batchOptions.setBatchSet( FedoraAppConstants.GENERIC_BATCHSET_NAME );
batchOptions.setClearCompletedFiles( false );
batchOptions.setClearFailedFiles( false );
batchOptions.setClearLogFile( false );
batchOptions.setInstitution( FedoraAppConstants.GENERIC_INSTITUTION_NAME );
batchOptions.setSplitXMLinWorkDirToMets( true );
batchOptions.setStopOnError(false)
batchOptions.setStrictUpdates(true)
batchOptions.setValidatePCOchecksums(false)
batchOPtions.setAsTask( true ) // this will use the taskTemp folder and take two task runs to complete an ingest.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getGenericBatchOptions

public static BatchIngestOptions getGenericBatchOptions()
Sets the following batchOptions...

batchOptions.setBatchDescription( "generic ingest" ); // set from batch file?
batchOptions.setBatchSet( FedoraAppConstants.GENERIC_BATCHSET_NAME );
batchOptions.setClearCompletedFiles( false );
batchOptions.setClearFailedFiles( false );
batchOptions.setClearLogFile( false );
batchOptions.setInstitution( FedoraAppConstants.GENERIC_INSTITUTION_NAME );
batchOptions.setSplitXMLinWorkDirToMets( true );
batchOptions.setStopOnError(false)
batchOptions.setStrictUpdates(true)
batchOptions.setValidatePCOchecksums(false)
batchOPtions.setAsTask( true ) // this will use the taskTemp folder and take two task runs to complete an ingest.
Set the ExtRel list for fedora VERY IMPORTANT so that it gets ingested into correct islandora collection.

Returns:
the batchOptions object

getEctdOptions

public static BatchIngestOptions getEctdOptions()
Deprecated. 

In addition to generic options, this methods sets the following batchOptions...

batchOptions.setBatchDescription( "ECTD generic ingest" ); // set from batch file?
batchOptions.setBatchSet( FedoraAppConstants.ECTD_BATCHSET_NAME );
batchOptions.setInstitution( FedoraAppConstants.DU_INSTITUTION_NAME );

Along with the following from the ectd properties file.
batchOptions.setStopOnError();
batchOptions.setStrictUpdates();
batchOptions.setValidatePCOchecksums();

Set the ExtRel list for fedora VERY IMPORTANT so that it gets ingested into correct islandora collection.

Returns:
the batchOptions object
See Also:
getGenericBatchOptions()
